title: ReVamp Rivals Is looking for a D2+ Support Main to join our team roster.

embed.description: Hello and welcome to ReVamp Esports! ReVamp's mission is to grow the organisation to not only be a League of Legends based organisation but also have CSGO and Overwatch teams in the near future. We are wanting to stand out and announce ourselves to all of Australia and hopefully soon be one of or the biggest organisation in OCE.

body:
Team: ReVamp Rivals
Position: Support
Rank preferable:  D2+
Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScazz7iVsE7q_U7fHozmEMz2iKKJQrEIsvbZoAyDlXvSzuiIw/viewform

Hey Guys weâ€™re looking for a **dedicated player**, regularly active and wanting to improve in a toxic-free group of similar aspiration.
Currently we are looking to recruit a **diamond 2+ support** for a active full roster for the team, In the upcoming future ReVamp Rivals is currently looking to work and build and aim towards a potential **Oceanic Challenger Series** spot in 2020.

You will be contacted in regards for setting up trial dates.


Our current roster consists  of these players.
Top - The Real Mail
Jg- JinXv
Mid- Azus
Adc- trying my best z (Hideto)
Support- TBT

Management Team
Prym- Owner
[Britney Senpai]  - Manager

If you have any futher questions about the application or avalabilitys please send a DM to either discord profile or Send a message in game
**Discords:
**Manager- ~Britney Senpai~#8534
Player- MaiI#0873
**Igns
**
Manager- Britney Senpai
Player- The Real MaiI


Thanks for your time! {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
